title: Episode 216: Deconstructing the Internet with Taylor Lorenz
itunes:title: Episode 216: Deconstructing the Internet with Taylor Lorenz
description:
Kate tries a new lip product that seems like wizardry and Doree prepares to have people over for dinner for the first time in a while. Then, Washington Post columnist Taylor Lorenz joins them to talk about how Tumblr started her journey into reporting, why she thinks ADHD helps her do her job better, and why she has probably thousands of unread text messages. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show or shopmyshelf.us/forever35.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
